text:
@GaryLineker But social distancing doesn’t matter in one of the worst hit cities in the world?

The ‘younger generation’ may not die from Coronavirus (or even be slightly I’ll from it), but they may pass it onto an older person with underlying health conditions and bring their death forward.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
